duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure all Bakery and Produce products meet high quality standards and integrity guidelines.
Merchandise Bakery and Produce products in innovative and eye-catching ways.
Stock and rotate Bakery and Produce items as needed.
Provide excellent customer service by answering product-related questions and helping customers.
Organize and clean prep areas, freezers, coolers, and sales floor for food safety and sanitation.
Check shipments for out-of-date and damaged products to ensure freshness and quality.
